channel.title: Attacking emote bug
channel.description: I dont like the attacking.Im using whitescape.For example if i click on the npc which is not near you,then you walk/run to it.When you come near it the player attacks it but the animations doesnt shows up until he stops walking/running,or if i dont kill the npc with 1 hit i only see animation when the player attacks second time.How can i make so the player attacks when hes running?

item.title: Attacking emote bug
item.dc:creator: @runaway runaway
item.description:
@runaway wrote:

i like this bug.I allways kill my friends lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Attacking emote bug
item.dc:creator: @Calvin Calvin
item.description:
@Calvin wrote:

Whitefang, you might want to know that if you keep clicking on an NPC when attacking, it hits it a hell of a lot of times.

Read full topic
